name: The Legend of Zelda: Specter's Oculus
storyline:
"They were banished; chased across the sacred lands of Hyrule and driven away" - Whispers on the winds breath...

Now... A king among thieves wielding a mighty trident stalks the land searching for the Oculus fabeled to merge light and dark into shadow.
When an evil darkness enshrouds the land of Hyrule, a young boy named Link must awaken the hero within and uncover the mysteries of his past as well as the ties that bind him to the other triforce keepers. Uncover the truth in The Legend of Zelda: Specter's Oculus...
